text: Berkley Warren Bedell (March 5, 1921 - December 7, 2019) was an American politician. He was a U.S. Representative from Iowa. He served as representatives from 1975 to 1987. Bedell was a Democrat and supported Barack Obama in 2012.Obama Picks Up More Endorsements (December 24, 2007) Newsmax, Retrieved on January 19, 2008 He was an active critic on Ronald Reagan during his presidency. Bedell died in Naples, Florida on December 7, 2019 of a stroke-related problems, aged 98. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Businesspeople from Iowa Category:United States representatives from Iowa Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
